subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick lost to David Ferrer, 6-7 (5), 6-2, 7-6 (2) , while Andy Murray eased into the semifinals with a 6-3, 6-2 win over qualifier Matthew Ebden at the Shanghai Masters.
snippet: Andy Roddick lost to David Ferrer, 6-7 (5), 6-2, 7-6 (2) , while Andy Murray eased into the semifinals with a 6-3, 6-2 win over qualifier Matthew Ebden at the Shanghai Masters.
